verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> [was] one שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years צִדְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְאַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> a עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother's [חֲמִיטַל כ] (חֲמוּטַ֥ל <S%H2537><s%> Hamutal ק) בַּֽת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> of Jeremiah מִלִּבְנָֽה׃ <S%H3841><s%> of Libnah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the eyes יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> had done יְהוֹיָקִֽים׃ <S%H3079><s%> according to all that Jehoiakim

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> For עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For through אַ֣ף <S%H639><s%> the anger יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <S%H3389><s%> it came to pass in Jerusalem וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הִשְׁלִיכ֥וֹ <S%H7993><s%> till he had cast them out אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> through פָּנָ֑יו <S%H6440><s%> from his presence וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <S%H4775><s%> rebelled צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> that Zedekiah בְּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> against the king בָּבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> came בַשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַתְּשִׁעִ֜ית <S%H8671><s%> And it came to pass in the ninth לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָעֲשִׂירִי֮ <S%H6224><s%> in the tenth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <S%H6218><s%> in the tenth לַחֹדֶשׁ֒ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month בָּ֠א <S%H935><s%> came נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֨ר <S%H5019><s%> [that] Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵילוֹ֙ <S%H2428><s%> he and all his army עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> against Jerusalem וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> and pitched עָלֶ֑יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against וַיִּבְנ֥וּ <S%H1129><s%> against it and built עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> against דָּיֵ֖ק <S%H1785><s%> forts סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> against it round about

וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> So הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> the city בַּמָּצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> was besieged עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> until עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H6249><s%> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah

בַּחֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָֽרְבִיעִי֙ <S%H7243><s%> And in the fourth בְּתִשְׁעָ֣ה <S%H8672><s%> in the ninth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month וַיֶּחֱזַ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> was sore הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> the famine בָּעִ֑יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> so that there was no bread לְעַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> for the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

וַתִּבָּקַ֣ע <S%H1234><s%> was broken up הָעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> Then the city וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֡ה <S%H4421><s%> of war יִבְרְחוּ֩ <S%H1272><s%> fled וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> and went forth מֵהָעִ֜יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night דֶּ֜רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between הַחֹמֹתַ֙יִם֙ <S%H2346><s%> between the two walls אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גַּ֣ן <S%H1588><s%> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which [was] by the king's וְכַשְׂדִּ֥ים <S%H3778><s%> (now the Chaldeans עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> [were] by the city סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> were all וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הָעֲרָבָֽה׃ <S%H6160><s%> of the plain

וַיִּרְדְּפ֤וּ <S%H7291><s%> pursued חֵיל־ <S%H2428><s%> But the army כַּשְׂדִּים֙ <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיַּשִּׂ֥יגוּ <S%H5381><s%> and overtook אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> Zedekiah בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains יְרֵח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <S%H2428><s%> and all his army נָפֹ֖צוּ <S%H6327><s%> was scattered מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂוּ֙ <S%H8610><s%> Then they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> and carried him up אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon רִבְלָ֖תָה <S%H7247><s%> to Riblah בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> where he gave אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for מִשְׁפָּטִֽים׃ <S%H4941><s%> judgment

וַיִּשְׁחַ֧ט <S%H7819><s%> slew מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> And the king בָּבֶ֛ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> of Zedekiah לְעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> before his eyes וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> also אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> also all the princes יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah שָׁחַ֥ט <S%H7819><s%> he slew בְּרִבְלָֽתָה׃ <S%H7247><s%> in Riblah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H6667><s%> of Zedekiah עִוֵּ֑ר <S%H5786><s%> Then he put out וַיַּאַסְרֵ֣הוּ <S%H631><s%> bound בַֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֗יִם <S%H5178><s%> him in chains וַיְבִאֵ֤הוּ <S%H935><s%> and carried מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> and the king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בָּבֶ֔לָה <S%H894><s%> him to Babylon וַיִּתְּנֵ֥הוּ <S%H5414><s%> and put [בְבֵית־ כ] (בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> court הַפְּקֻדֹּ֖ת <S%H1004><s%> court ק) עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> till the day מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> of his death

וּבַחֹ֤דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַֽחֲמִישִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> Now in the fifth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <S%H6218><s%> in the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> which שְׁנַת֙ <S%H8141><s%> year תְּשַֽׁע־ <S%H8672><s%> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <S%H5019><s%> of Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king בָּבֶ֑ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בָּ֗א <S%H935><s%> came נְבֽוּזַרְאֲדָן֙ <S%H5018><s%> Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> captain טַבָּחִ֔ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard עָמַ֛ד <S%H5975><s%> abide לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> accept מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> into Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> And burned אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בָּתֵּ֧י <S%H1004><s%> and all the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the houses הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great שָׂרַ֥ף <S%H8313><s%> [men] burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> he with fire וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every

חֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2346><s%> all the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about נָֽתְצוּ֙ <S%H5422><s%> brake down כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> And all the army כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> that [were] with the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <S%H2876><s%> of the guard

וּמִדַּלּ֨וֹת <S%H1803><s%> [certain] of the poor הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the residue הָעָ֣ם ׀ <S%H5971><s%> of the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <S%H7604><s%> that remained בָּעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֹּֽפְלִים֙ <S%H5307><s%> and those that fell away אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who נָֽפְלוּ֙ <S%H5307><s%> that fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the rest הָֽאָמ֑וֹן <S%H527><s%> of the multitude הֶגְלָ֕ה <S%H1540><s%> carried away captive נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֖ן <S%H5018><s%> Then Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <S%H2876><s%> of the guard

וּמִדַּלּ֣וֹת <S%H1803><s%> [certain] of the poor הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land הִשְׁאִ֕יר <S%H7604><s%> left נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֖ן <S%H5018><s%> But Nebuzaradan רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> the captain טַבָּחִ֑ים <S%H2876><s%> of the guard לְכֹרְמִ֖ים <S%H3755><s%> for vinedressers וּלְיֹגְבִֽים׃ <S%H3009><s%> and for husbandmen

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּוּדֵ֨י <S%H5982><s%> Also the pillars הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> that [were] in the house יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּכֹנ֞וֹת <S%H4350><s%> and the bases וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָ֧ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַנְּחֹ֛שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and the brasen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> that [was] in the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שִׁבְּר֣וּ <S%H7665><s%> brake כַשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> the Chaldeans וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and carried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נְחֻשְׁתָּ֖ם <S%H5178><s%> all the brass בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> of them to Babylon
